text:
Hey Everyone,

I’m new to HubSpot. Starting with adding contacts on HubSpot contact listing. I am using “hapikey” api to make a request to HubSpot. But getting this error
```"This app hasn't been granted all required scopes to make this call. Read more about required scopes"```
Will you please provide your guidance how to set scopes in developer account. I am doing it from my localhost.

Hey folks,

we're using the API to fetch changed records and sync those changes to our own system. We use the search endpoint (e.g. /crm/v3/objects/contacts/search) since this allows us to both filter and sort by last-updated-at. This way we can fetch all changes since the last time we polled. Every time a record (contact, w/e) is changed we also poll the associations.

In general this works well but today I realized that adding or removing an association does not mark an object as "changed", so the poller doesn't trigger and the associations are not synced. Only if I also change e.g. the contact's name, the poller finds the updated contact which triggers the association sync.

What is the recommended way to fetch recently changed associations?
Should still be there. It is for us.

Ah, that's a good point. I actually misspoke because while this is within the context of a react application, this is all happening in my connected express server. So I am either sending the POST request directly to HubSpot from Postman (which works) or I am using Postman to hit my app's endpoint which contains a function that sends the same POST request to HubSpot (this does not work). Does that help?
I was able to use the Export CTA data from the UI, Question: Is there a way to import into a test portal with UI?

Hi there - trying to access 'Subscriptions' using the API Key and when we attempt it it says we don't have the '<http://communications-preferences.read/|communications-preferences.read>' permissions can any one help please? HS support has directed us here...

Hi there! Please I need some help...
I Have a chatbot in other platform and I need to send the message of the conversation to hubstop so I can see it like it was in the HubSpot chat.
there is a way I can do this?
There is an API  where I can send the conversation from this customer and have all the trace in HubSpot?

Hi there!
This is Luis,
I am new in HubSpot
I would like to ask something to you. Do you think it would be possible to create a page (HubSpot template)out of deal properties?

Once a deal has a contract date - that means a customer has purchased the home - at which point we want to create a link for the customer so they can track the progress of the home they purchased

Is that possible to make it?

Hey Luis, if you’re on HubSpot enterprise and/or Ops Hub, there could be a way to automate this via the workflow tool + coded workflow actions to add new rows to a HubDB table (with dynamic pages turned on) based on the deal data.

Hello community,

I have a question, how can I change the type of association? In the image it is as _*vehículo_to_contact*_, I would like to change it.

Not sure if this is the right channel...

I'm trying to do a simple, routine connection to CallRail... and for some reason, I keep getting THIS error.

I have top permissions on both HubSpot and CallRail, so I'm super confused. Help?
<@U032HMTRWKD> for me its showing like this
Aha I am on professional plan
Can you log the actual request instead of the variable name?
Are you making api requests directly from browser?
